review.comment:
It was great to meet you Prabin, Anisha and Caitlin, thank you for the warm welcome this evening!
The whole team at 360 Dental Marketing are a pleasure to work with, very helpful with record time response to enquiry and all done with enthusiasm and a smile!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for attending our event Sharon! It was so lovely to have the chance to talk face-to-face after working together over the phone and via email for months. The team are so happy to hear you enjoyed last night and we hope to see you at the next event!

review.comment: The best dental marketing company we have worked with. Friendly, professional, best industry knowledge. 👍
review.review_reply: Thank you Dr Naseem and Dr Arwa for choosing us for Atria Dental's branding and dental marketing. Clients like you are an absolute delight to work with. :)

review.comment: Prabin, Shelina and the team at 360 dental are fantastic. They have just completed building my new website and it looks great. The whole process was smooth and efficient. Shelina responds to messages quickly even if it’s after hours. Thanks for providing a great experience!
review.review_reply: Thank you Dr Shehan, for your feedback 😊 and for being such an amazing ultra-responsive and easy-to-reach client. You made our job so easy.

review.comment: Very efficient staff. Quick to fix any problems I have. Definitely recommend anyone looking to improve their dental practice.

review.review_reply: Thank you Victoria for your generous feedback.  :)

review.comment: Great digital marketing agency to work with. Very approachable, easy to communicate with and very efficient in services. Probably the best IT Firm in Melbourne.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your feedback, Kaivalya Jani! It's our pleasure to have you as our loyal client 😊

review.comment: I have been working with Anisha for a few years. Her response and support has been of a very high standard always. Recently I encountered a technical issue. Anisha responded promptly and walked me through the problem and solved it. Great to know that support is always available just a phone call away. Tonima
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your feedback, Tonima Ghose! It's our pleasure to have you as our loyal client 😊

review.comment: Prabin and his team really care and value their clients and I highly recommend any dentists looking for a total package solution for their practice needs to speak to Prabin and his amazing team!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your message. Really appreciate. :)

review.comment:
Very professional  and  easy to get in touch whenever needed !
Working with 360' Dental marketing has made my first time business website set up more than easy and smooth. Very knowledge and supportive group of people , and a great team,  I highly recommended !  Thanks Prabin, Anisha ,Shelina and the team!
review.review_reply:
Monica,

We’re glad you are happy with our service! Thank you so much for your positive feedback and for taking the time to post this review. We really appreciate your business. We would love to make your experience even more amazing. Thanks!!

review.comment:
The team from 360° Dental Marketing, have been amazing. Having heard so many positive things from other colleagues, we entrusted 360° Dental Marketing, for our dental marketing & since then both our practice has been busier than ever. To be precise, we have noticed a dramatic difference as we have never had such successful results before working with other marketing experts. Our practices are now easily found in Google which is why we are always fully booked with appointments that we had to bring in more chairs in both the practices.

Having two practices has never been this better. Kudos to the team for always being responsive & accountable! Just love how professional they are.
Prabin and the girls have been so helpful with getting us the website we wanted. Would highly recommend!
Very professional and result oriented. Highly recommend!
360° Dental Marketing has been working on our email marketing and offline marketing. We had never experienced such a growth in appointments before. Professional, insightful, excellent communication.
